scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Christ Child, standing and holding a crown in his left hand, with his right hand raised in a gesture of blessing. He is bathed in a golden light emanating from above, surrounded by a multitude of winged cherubs and fiery seraphim against a blue, cloudy sky. Below, two angels flank a royal coat of arms featuring three fleur-de-lis on a blue shield, surmounted by a crown. Banners with Latin inscriptions surround the coat of arms, including "REGIS MATRIS & SORORIS" and "TER MARIVM NOBILE VNVE EST DESIDERIVM". The lower portion of the image shows a green, grassy landscape.
